comments:
I can reproduce this bug:
1. i just had done an update from the CVS server
2. i clicked on one file to have the popup menu from package explorer view
3. i selected Compare With -> Another branch or version
4. i selected the "Versions" item
5. i clicked on "Refresh Tags"
6. the execption appeared in the "Error Log" view
7. a message box is shown but i wasn't able to click on it, i had to cancel the
   CVS dialog first.

Here is the exception:

Error 2006-02-10 09:56:08.754 Error refreshing tags
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException

... 2 more

I am unable to reproduce this. Is there anything special about the project or file being refreshed? Does it fail for all files or just particular ones? Is the project containing the file a folder on the server or a module defined in the CVSROOT/modules file? Please reopen if you can provide more specifics on how to reproduce this.
